Posts.Content: Kylersmommy1010 wrote: I know this is not breast related but I have been having numbness and pain in my hands for about 2 weeks now. It only happens at night when I am sleeping. My left hand is more severe than my right. My hands will go numb during the night and the next morning my fingers will be sore for about 4 hours or so. Not sure what's going on?? Posts.Content: Kylersmommy1010 wrote: Not sure what's going on but for about a week now I have had a burning sensation/pain in my left breast. The pain is deep not on the surface. I don't have any lumps or redness. The pain only happens when I lay on my left side. The longer I lay on my side the morr intense the pain gets. I just had a baby 2 weeks ago.. not sure what could be causing this? Log in to post a reply
